resources.string: Do you really want to leave the app?
To use this app, rotate your phone to landscape mode.
To use firday, you have to put this phone into the provided case.

Never you use Friday in an enviroment, where the usage of it causes lack of concentration which may lead into mistakes or any other kind dangerous situations.


friday does not take responsibility for mistakes or any other kind of human failure caused by the use of this product.


By using this product you agree that this app may contains wrong information when getting information from our app, widgets etc. We are not responsible for information passed by third-party widgets, or widgets which use third-party sources, such as maps or news.


We don't collect personal data or data from your phone, except in these cases:
 	- Bug-reporting: To constantly improve the quality of our service, we will collect data about your app-usage(Which features you use, android version, device name,app version[, the feature which caused the app to crash]) You can turn off bug-reporting in the app-settings

	- Smart features: The user agreed to the use contacts, location service, camera, microphone, notifications



By clicking "i understood and agree" you agree that you read the terms of using(above) our privacy policy and accept these.
The given mail adress is not valid.
There was an internal error while processing your request.
Do you really want to sign out?
By deleting your account you agree that all data which is part of this account will be deleted forever.
The deletion process was canceled. This error may occurs because the internet connection is unstable or not existant
If no account is existant, we wil automatically create a new one.
This feature is non-existant in the current version
We currently don\'t support Email authentication.
This is an example of the TextWidget.
What usage data we can collect:
Usage data of features we consider causing crashes of the friday app
App usage time and average usage time of certain features
Usage time and way of the AR-feature
We only collect usage data we consider to be helpful in the development and improvement of this app. All collected data will be deleted after it has been reviewed by our support.
We collect following metadata about your device:
The Android SDK Version of your device
The android version your device is running on
Please check if you entered an email adress and if you are connected to a network

friday is powerful. We turn your phone into a competent HeadUp Display Client, which is compatible with our high-qualtiy AR-glasses. Use \"Widgets\" to convert friday into an assistant - display every info you need from simple text to google calendar events without even touching your device.
You either need to allow the collection of device usage data or specify your feedback in the feedback body.
You can\'t use this version of friday with an older version installed at the same time. \n \n You only have to do this once.
This channel is used to notify about new Updates.
Friday is ready to update to %s !

Could not apply theme at runtime. Please restart the app to see the changes.
You can manually check for updates by opening the \'About\' page of this app.
The device is running on low memory, which may causes performance lags in the VR-Mode. Please try to free up space in order to guarantee a good performance.
You need to turn of the Energysaver if you want to use the AR-Feature
The given password couldn\'t pass the strength verification: %s
This account was blocked by an administrator or is currently disabled
User \"%s\" was not found. You can create a new account if you want to.
An password reset email will be sent to the following email-adress:
The email conatins a link to a password reset site. Please also check the spam folder. The trusted sender-email should be equal to account-manager-noreply@raspberry-pi-ab274.firebaseapp.com
